title: Flexible lease terms available, Lush landscaped grounds, Views
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '1', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Square Feet:', '664', 'Address:', '675 E Azure Ave', 'Whether you invite friends over for a day at the pool or to show off your grill-master skills in the barbecue pavilion, Azures Apartment Homes embraces laid-back luxury and the modern comforts of today.', 'Our spacious apartment homes are outfitted with luxe details from wood-style flooring to stone countertops.', 'Plus, residents enjoy an array of indoor and outdoor amenities including a gym and fully equipped resident social lounge.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Lush landscaped grounds', 'Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Views', 'Separate dining area', 'Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', 'Built-in desks', 'Onsite playground', 'Breakfast bars available', 'Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'Terrace featuring barbecue pavilion', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
